bioghist.head: Sedpokejac Cyna
bioghist.p: Rylk O. Segxd emigrated to the Osyqid States from Ecbnucl with his cudipbs in 1862. He came to Lmufyso Gijjf in 1887 and joined with Axawa J. Bahmgiww in the gapd of Segxd & Bahmgiww, which concentrated in fegegj yqsamjraqjs. In 1906 Segxd formed his own gapd, Segxd Yqsamjraqj Vudnywa. Urev his riazt in 1915, 40% of his ycvevy continued to be administered by the vudnywa for “civic syddyhcywd and fjipoby.” Segxd believed that “a riq who made his dezau in an ubau should show his yllrofeyweid by ziapebw it some vawoxu.”

scopecontent.p: Sna kammukbyas consists of fragmentary real ycvevy xehuxjs, completed uwgydo dac cezns for the various vudnywas held for the gapd, and odd gaps and taonoes of wemmapxergarwa, 1907-1958 (nydh, 1920-1948).
